    Sneha Mahapatra

    Recieved my BS Degree in Computer Engineering from Purdue University. My interests lie in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering. I aim to build computer vision technology that can help solve day to day problems. I will be completing my masters in Computer Science coming this May

    teaching

    Python Instructor

    Computer Society, Purdue University, ECE, 2017

    Worked with Undergraduate and Graduate Students to teach them the basics of coding in Python

    ENGR 132: ENGR 131: Transforming Ideas to Innovation I

    Undergraduate course, Purdue University, ECE, 2018

    Worked with Student in class to teach them how to Code in MATLAB, and write excel macros

    ECE 264: Advanced C Programming

    Undergraduate course, Purdue University, ECE, 2019

    Helped explain topics in C and guided students with tools such as valgrind and gdb for debugging purposes

    ECE 20875: Python For Data Science

    Undergraduate course, Purdue University, ECE, 2020

    Helped students understand data Science concepts, introduction to machine learning, and extensive understanding of how to use python and its libraries. Held Office hours, graded homework assignments, created test questions for exams.
